text: I've just had a wonderful Cook Islands’ welcome as we arrive in Rarotonga for the 43rd Pacific Islands Forum http://t.co/8b43IPjB
Six weeks ago, we took actions to get to the bottom of the Hospital School problems -something that no previous government had done-
The decision to intervene Hospital School, to transfer the command to UNAH aroused strong reactions. They demanded: "Another big bomb!"
We are seeing results ... uncovering a black reality with the purchase of medicines -only this way the real changes will be achieved-
Our goal is to improve attention to the public and end the lack of medicines, equipment, mismanagement and corruption above all.
With the support of the people, our government will continue on the path of change. Go ahead, Honduras, go ahead!

The Paralympic Games began. Photographers 'photo exhibition was held in Omotesando in Japan, photographs by Takao Ochi who was taking para sports in weekly Asahi' s top gravure were introduced. It is said that the pattern of the competition will be live broadcast, and we can not keep an eye on this one http://t.co/Ad9W6tyA

For the Paralympic Games, many candidates for medals will participate, including Kennedy player of tennis, Akiyama swimmer, and so on. From Hokkaido, Icezaki Daisuke player of rugby, Tomoko Ono of swimming competition, Kazuyuki Kyotani of basketball player, Seiji Fujita of bicycle will participate. Let 's send a cheer to local players by all means!

Hello to everyone. Today is August 30th Victory Day. I congratulate all my citizens on the August 30 Victory Day.
Despite my request, I can not attend the ceremonies on the advice of doctors.
Treatment in Hacettepe university hospital is ongoing. I will stay here for a few more days. http://t.co/proab8id
Right, you are doing everything that comes from all the staff's hands.
Thank goodness my health is improving. My doctors make the necessary explanations, and they always share the most up-to-date information with you.
Beyond the state level, messages of love and sincerity from all over Turkey are raining. http://t.co/m3winuvj
I receive your greetings, your prayers. Allah be pleased with all of you.
By the way, I do not have any time at the hospital. I keep working, reading reports and books. http://t.co/lx3x9gek
Be entrusted to God as soon as you meet again in the shortest time.
